scripts.build-dev: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development node --inspect dist/index.js
scripts.request: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js
scripts.start: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node dist/index.js
scripts.ors: npm run cleanup && npm run ors-benchmark && npm run average
scripts.pelias-geocoding: npm run cleanup && npm run pelias-populate && npm run pelias-geocoding-benchmark && npm run average
scripts.pelias-autocomplete: npm run cleanup && npm run pelias-populate && npm run pelias-autocomplete-benchmark && npm run average
scripts.start:pm2: yarn build && yarn cleanup && pm2 kill && pm2 start process.yml
